name: Masters' Union
description: Established in 2020, Master’s Union in Gurgaon redefines business education with its innovative curriculum and prominent faculty lineup featuring CXOs, MDs, and startup founders. The institute boasts a competitive acceptance rate of 12%, offering the flagship UG in Tech & Business Management. With a fee of INR 37,96,650 and rigorous selection criteria including a Scholarship Test or SAT/ACT, Master’s Union achieved remarkable placements in 2023.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Learn Business by Running Business
ShortDescription: A technology-focused business school offering an industry immersive post graduate programme.

Highlights.name: Rich Learning Experiences
Highlights.description: Beyond academics, student clubs offer co-curricular activities like case studies, industry expert interactions, and exposure.

Highlights.name: Holistic Development
Highlights.description: Extracurricular clubs promote cultural awareness, participation in sports and arts, and overall well-being.

Highlights.name: Lifelong Connections
Highlights.description: Masters' Union fosters a strong sense of community through events, celebrations, and student-run organizations.

enhanced_description: Established in 2020 in Gurgaon, Masters' Union redefines business education with a 'Learn Business by Running Business' philosophy, focusing on technology and industry immersion. It offers flagship programs, including a UG in Tech & Business Management and an industry-immersive post-graduate program. The institution boasts an innovative curriculum and a prominent faculty comprising CXOs, MDs, and startup founders. With a competitive 12% acceptance rate and rigorous selection criteria, Masters' Union achieved remarkable placements in 2023, aiming to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency.
key_use_cases: Accelerated skill development for business and technology roles
Providing industry-immersive learning experiences in business management
Developing practical business acumen through real-world scenarios
Facilitating personalized learning journeys for students aiming for leadership roles
Sourcing high-quality, industry-ready talent for companies
competitive_advantages: Prominent faculty lineup featuring CXOs, MDs, and startup founders
Highly selective admission process (12% acceptance rate)
Hands-on, 'Learn Business by Running Business' pedagogical approach
roi_benefits: Delivery of high-quality, industry-ready talent to the workforce
Accelerated skill development and improved learning efficiency for participants
Enhanced career opportunities and strong placements for graduates
Practical application of business knowledge, leading to quicker productivity for employers
primary_users: Individuals seeking higher education in business and technology
Students aiming for careers in technology-driven business environments
